alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Fayette; Nicholas; Scott; Woodford (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 9:26AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN WOODFORD...SOUTHERN SCOTT...BOURBON...CENTRAL NICHOLAS AND NORTHERN FAYETTE COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 AM EDT... At 926 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Highlands, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Paris, Carlisle, Meadowthorpe, Dunbar High School, Thoroughbred Acres, Cardinal Hill, Northland, Highlands and Bryan Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
